DataElement.preferredName: Lung Nodule Characteristic For Metastasis Present Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to whether or not pulmonary nodule characteristics for metastasis were present.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pulmonary Nodule Characteristic For Metastasis Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A benign or malignant small, oval or round growth in the lung. It can be due to infectious, inflammatory or neoplastic processes._The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance._The reason of something._The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A benign or malignant small, oval or round growth in the lung. It can be due to infectious, inflammatory or neoplastic processes.:The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

Concepts.definition: A benign or malignant small, oval or round growth in the lung. It can be due to infectious, inflammatory or neoplastic processes.
The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

Property.preferredDefinition: The reason of something.:The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: Were lung nodule characterist
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were lung nodule characteristics for metastasis present?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have less than or equal to 4 nodules per lung consistent with or suspicious for metastases?
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have less than or equal to 4 nodules per lung consistent with or suspicious for metastases?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have <= 4 nodules per lung consistent with or suspicious for metastases, with at least one of which being >= 3 mm and all of which must be <= 3 cm size (see Section 16.4.2)

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2023.3.7 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0002127. ak
